headline: Warren Buffett’s Secret Weapon for 2026
summary: As Warren Buffett prepares to hand over leadership of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-A)(NYSE:BRK-B) to Greg Abel by year’s end, his strategy remains focused on resilience amid market uncertainty.
